b2b.title: Join as B2B
b2b.description: For Industrial and Wholesale scrap sellers and buyers. Manage bulk orders and business transactions.

b2c.title: Join as B2C
b2c.description: For Retail scrap buyers and sellers. Buy directly from customers and manage retail orders.

delivery.title: Join as Door Step Buyer
delivery.description: Become a delivery partner. Collect scrap from retail shops and wholesalers via forwarded customer orders.

locationDisclosure.title: Location Access Required
locationDisclosure.disclosureText:
This app needs access to your location to provide the following features:

• Track your location during order pickups and deliveries
• Show your current location on maps
• Enable real-time location sharing with customers
• Provide accurate delivery tracking

Your location is only used when you are actively using the app for order-related activities. We do not track your location when the app is not in use for order purposes.
locationDisclosure.backgroundText: We may need to access your location in the background when you are actively completing an order pickup or delivery. This allows us to provide real-time tracking to customers even when the app is minimized. Location tracking stops automatically when the order is completed.
locationDisclosure.privacyText: Your location data is only used for order tracking and is not shared with third parties. You can revoke this permission at any time in your device settings.
